comments:
Workbench build 200403100800

When you go "Help->Help Contents", you get 12 identical exceptions (bottom of 
this bug).  One is coming from EMF and the 11 others are coming from Hyades ( 
I will log bug for them too)

I have narrow the exceptions to EMF and Hyades by process of elimination of 
plugins.

The EMF version 2.0.0 build id is: 200403081633

I can't reproduce this.  We don't have a file call tocMain.xml as implied by 
this:
!MESSAGE Error occurred processing file mainToc.xml.

So I tried the latest workbench build 20040318 and I could not reproduce the 
problem anymore. So it was fixed.

I have double checked that the error was coming from the EMF plugin in build 
20040310 (Actions: When I removed the EMF plugins, the error was not there when 
I reran Eclipse. When I put the EMF plugins back, the error shows)
